questions.questionText: Q1: Which board are you studying in?
options: (A) CBSE
(B) ICSE
(C) State Board
(D) International (IB/IGCSE)

questions.questionText: Q2: Have you already chosen a stream?
options: (A) Yes, but I’m unsure about my subjects.
(B) No, I need help deciding.
questions.notes: If (A), we refine their subject choices. If (B), we proceed with interest-based questions to suggest a stream.

questions.questionText: Q3: What type of challenges do you enjoy solving?
options: (A) Math-based problems & coding ➝ Science (PCM), AI, Commerce (Finance)
(B) Biological experiments & health sciences ➝ Science (PCB), Medicine, Biotech
(C) Understanding society, politics, and human behavior ➝ Humanities, Law, Civil Services
(D) Managing money, businesses, and markets ➝ Commerce, Business Studies
(E) Designing, storytelling, or creating content ➝ Arts & Design

questions.questionText: Q4: Which school subjects do you find most engaging?
options: (A) Math & Physics ➝ Science (PCM), AI, Engineering
(B) Biology & Chemistry ➝ Science (PCB), Medicine, Biotech
(C) History & Political Science➝ Humanities, Law, Civil Services
(D) Business Studies & Economics ➝ Commerce, Finance, Marketing
(E) Fine Arts & Media Studies ➝ Arts & Design, Animation, Filmmaking

questions.questionText: Q5: If you had to choose a weekend project, what would it be?
options: (A) Building a robot or coding an AI model ➝ Science (PCM), Engineering, AI
(B) Researching how medicines work & conducting experiments ➝ Science (PCB), Medicine
(C) Writing a blog on current affairs or social issues ➝ Humanities, Journalism
(D) Creating a business plan or stock market analysis ➝ Commerce, Entrepreneurship
(E) Producing a short film, painting, or digital artwork ➝ Arts, Design, Media

questions.questionText: Q6: Which career sounds most exciting to you?
options: (A) AI Engineer, Space Scientist, Software Developer ➝ Science (PCM)
(B) Doctor, Biotechnologist, Neuroscientist ➝ Science (PCB)
(C) Lawyer, Civil Servant, Journalist ➝ Humanities
(D) Investment Banker, CA, Business Owner ➝ Commerce
(E) Graphic Designer, Filmmaker, Fashion Designer ➝ Arts

questions.questionText: Q7: Which of these activities do you enjoy the most?
options: (A) Programming & solving math puzzles ➝ Science (PCM), AI, Data Science
(B) Learning about human anatomy & medicine ➝ Science (PCB), Healthcare
(C) Debating, writing, and social activism ➝ Humanities, Law, Journalism
(D) Stock market analysis & business strategy ➝ Commerce, Finance
(E) Designing, photography, or animation ➝ Arts, Media, Design

questions.questionText: Q8: How do you prefer to work on projects?
options: (A) Individually, using logic and problem-solving ➝ Science (PCM), AI, Data Science
(B) Experimenting in labs & doing research ➝ Science (PCB), Medicine, Research
(C) Discussing & analyzing real-world issues with people ➝ Humanities, Law
(D) Organizing and managing people & resources ➝ Commerce, Business Studies
(E) Expressing ideas through visuals, music, or storytelling ➝ Arts, Design

questions.questionText: Q9: How do you make decisions about your future?
options: (A) Based on logic & problem-solving skills ➝ Science (PCM), AI, Engineering
(B) Based on curiosity about the human body & science ➝ Science (PCB), Medicine
(C) Based on societal issues & human behavior ➝ Humanities, Public Policy
(D) Based on financial opportunities & business growth ➝ Commerce, Finance
(E) Based on creativity & storytelling ability ➝ Arts, Media, Filmmaking

questions.questionText: Q10: If you could take an extra subject, what would it be?
options: (A) Computer Science ➝ Science (PCM), AI, Software Engineering
(B) Psychology ➝ Science (PCB), Neuroscience, Therapy
(C) Political Science ➝ Humanities, Law, Civil Services
(D) Business Studies ➝ Commerce, Marketing, Management
(E) Fine Arts ➝ Arts, Design, Filmmaking
